scope.goal: ThemeForest-grade, multi-platform, style-engine-agnostic Button dataset for AI retrieval + deterministic builders
notes: This dataset describes one component (Button) with exhaustive metadata, variants, states, tokens, accessibility rules, and code templates.
It is language/framework-agnostic via adapters + templates. You can extend 'codeTemplates' with more targets as needed.

component.name: Button
component.description: Universal action control supporting clicks/press, navigation, loading/disabled states, icons, toggles, menus, and analytics hooks.

children.description: Button label/content. Required unless iconOnly=true and ariaLabel provided.

startIcon.description: Leading icon (LTR) / trailing in RTL if autoFlip=true.

endIcon.description: Trailing icon (LTR) / leading in RTL if autoFlip=true.

badge.description: Optional badge/chip counter attached to button.

loader.description: Loader shown in loading state; defaults to Spinner atom.

as.description: Render as native <button>, <a>, or framework router link component.

type.description: HTML button type (web only; ignored for links).

href.description: When as='a' or as='routerLink', destination URL/path.

rel.description: Link rel attribute. If target='_blank', enforce 'noopener noreferrer'.

density.description: Padding density; useful for ERP tables/toolbars.

iconOnly.description: Button contains only an icon; requires ariaLabel.

pressed.description: Toggle state; use aria-pressed when true/false and role is button.

expanded.description: Menu button expanded state; use aria-expanded.

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label. Required when iconOnly=true or children is not plain text.

ariaControls.description: ID of controlled element for menu/dialog.

hotkey.description: Keyboard shortcut hint, e.g. 'Ctrl+K'. Desktop/web optional.

requirements: Use <button> for actions; use <a> only for navigation.
If iconOnly=true then ariaLabel must be non-empty.
If pressed is used, set aria-pressed=true/false.
If expanded is used, set aria-expanded and aria-controls.
Ensure focus-visible ring is present and meets contrast guidelines.
Touch target minimum 44px on mobile (or equivalent dp).

web: Escape should close menus if button controls a menu (handled by parent)
desktop: Support hotkey hint; actual hotkey binding usually in app layer

contrast.default: Aim for WCAG AA contrast for text/icons vs background.

linkSafety: If target=_blank, force rel to include 'noopener noreferrer'.
Optionally validate href against allowlist in enterprise deployments.

baseTokens.--btn-transition: background 160ms ease, color 160ms ease, border-color 160ms ease, box-shadow 160ms ease, transform 80ms ease

personas.name: Enterprise
personas.notes: Conservative, high readability, subtle shadows, strong focus rings

personas.name: Neon
personas.notes: Cyber/neon accent with stronger glow focus

implementationNotes: Use focus-visible, not focus, for rings.
Ensure disabled links are rendered as <button> or prevent default + aria-disabled.

mobile.preferred: Pressable (React Native) or Gesture handler button
implementationNotes: For links, use navigation actions rather than href.

fallbacks.variant:link: use Pressable with text style + underline

desktop.preferred: Reuse web button in Electron/Tauri; optionally add native menu integration
implementationNotes: Support keyboard shortcuts hint display (hotkey prop).
Consider right-click context menu integration at app layer.

css-vars.description: Default. Uses class names + CSS variables tokens.

tailwind.description: Maps recipe tokens to tailwind utility classes (optionally via cn()).
notes: Prefer semantic class maps so tokens can still drive colors via tailwind config.

css-modules.description: Maps recipe keys to local scoped CSS module classes.

styled-components.description: Uses styled wrappers; tokens applied via theme + css vars.
notes: Still keep css vars as source-of-truth.

nativewind.description: Tailwind-like classes for React Native; keep same variant/tone/size API.

embeddingText: Button atom with variants solid outline ghost soft link
Supports loading disabled pressed expanded iconOnly fullWidth density compact
Works on web mobile desktop; React Next.js Vue Svelte Angular React Native Flutter
Tokens: css variables; personas enterprise minimal glass neon gov
Accessibility: aria-label for icon only, aria-pressed for toggle, focus-visible ring
